description:
Edgar Chang Martin was the Assistant Chief of the http://anidb.net/ch32500 [Asia Branch] of the http://anidb.net/ch32498 [Black Order], husband of http://anidb.net/ch84704 [Twi Chang], nephew of http://anidb.net/ch84703 [Zuu Mei Chang] and father of Bak Chang. He, like his wife, played a large role in the Second Exorcist Program until his death.
Source: D.Gray-man Wiki
name: Edgar Chang Martin
